text: Deggendorf (West Central Bavarian: Landkroas Degndoaf) is a Landkreis (district) in Bavaria, Germany. The Danube river runs through the district from west to east. The Isar river enters in the south and meets the Danube close to the town of Deggendorf. The Einödriegel (1,220 m) is the highest point within the district. ==Towns and municipalities== Towns Municipalities #Deggendorf #Osterhofen #Plattling #Aholming #Auerbach #Außernzell #Bernried #Buchhofen #Grafling #Grattersdorf #Hengersberg #Hunding #Iggensbach #Künzing 12.
